verses.verse: But on the <S%G1520>first<s%> day of the <S%G4521>week,<s%> at <S%G3722>early<s%> <S%G3722>dawn,<s%> they <S%G2064>came<s%> to the <S%G3418>tomb,<s%> <S%G5342>bringing<s%> the <S%G759>spices<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> they had <S%G2090>prepared.<s%>
And they <S%G2147>found<s%> the <S%G3037>stone<s%> <S%G617>rolled<s%> <S%G617>away<s%> from the <S%G3419>tomb,<s%>
but when they <S%G1525>entered,<s%> they did not <S%G2147>find<s%> the <S%G4983>body<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

And it <S%G1096>happened<s%> that <S%G1722>while<s%> they were <S%G639>perplexed<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G3778>this,<s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> suddenly <S%G2186>stood<s%> <S%G2186>near<s%> them in <S%G797>dazzling<s%> <S%G2066>apparel;<s%>

and as [the women] were <S%G1719>terrified<s%> and <S%G2827>bowed<s%> their <S%G4383>faces<s%> to the <S%G1093>ground,<s%> [the men] <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G5101>"Why<s%> do you <S%G2212>seek<s%> the <S%G2198>living<s%> One <S%G3326>among<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%>?
"He is not <S%G5602>here,<s%> but He has <S%G1453>risen.<s%> <S%G3403>Remember<s%> <S%G5613>how<s%> He <S%G2980>spoke<s%> to you while He was <S%G2089>still<s%> in <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%>

<S%G3004>saying<s%> that the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> be <S%G3860>delivered<s%> into the <S%G5495>hands<s%> of <S%G268>sinful<s%> <S%G444>men,<s%> and be <S%G4717>crucified,<s%> and the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G450>rise<s%> <S%G450>again.<s%> "
And they <S%G3403>remembered<s%> His <S%G4487>words,<s%>

and <S%G5290>returned<s%> from the <S%G3419>tomb<s%> and <S%G518>reported<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> to the <S%G1733>eleven<s%> and to <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3062>rest.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> they were <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G3094>Magdalene<s%> and <S%G2489>Joanna<s%> and <S%G3137>Mary<s%> the [mother] of <S%G2385>James;<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> the <S%G3062>other<s%> <S%G3062>women<s%> with them were <S%G3004>telling<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> to the <S%G652>apostles.<s%>
And <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G4487>words<s%> <S%G5316>appeared<s%> to them as <S%G3026>nonsense,<s%> and they would not <S%G569>believe<s%> them.

[But <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G450>arose<s%> and <S%G5143>ran<s%> to the <S%G3419>tomb;<s%> <S%G3879>stooping<s%> and <S%G3879>looking<s%> in, he <S%G991>saw<s%> the <S%G3608>linen<s%> <S%G3608>wrappings<s%> <S%G3441>only;<s%> and he <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G565>away<s%> to his <S%G848>home,<s%> <S%G2296>marveling<s%> at that which had <S%G1096>happened.<s%>]

And <S%G2400>behold,<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> of them were <S%G4198>going<s%> that <S%G846>very<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> to a <S%G2968>village<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G1695>Emmaus,<s%> which was about <S%G1835>seven<s%> <S%G4712>miles<s%> from <S%G2419>Jerusalem.<s%>

And they were <S%G3656>conversing<s%> with <S%G240>each<s%> <S%G240>other<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> which had <S%G4819>taken<s%> <S%G4819>place.<s%>

And it <S%G1096>came<s%> about that <S%G1722>while<s%> they were <S%G3656>conversing<s%> and <S%G4802>discussing,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G846>Himself<s%> <S%G1448>approached,<s%> and [began] <S%G4848>traveling<s%> with them.
But their <S%G3788>eyes<s%> were <S%G2902>prevented<s%> from <S%G1921>recognizing<s%> Him.

And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G5101>"What<s%> are <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3056>words<s%> that you are <S%G474>exchanging<s%> with <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another<s%> as you are <S%G4043>walking<s%>?" And they <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G2476>still,<s%> <S%G4659>looking<s%> <S%G4659>sad.<s%>

And <S%G1520>one<s%> of them, <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G2810>Cleopas,<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, "Are You the <S%G3441>only<s%> <S%G3441>one<s%> <S%G3939>visiting<s%> <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%> and <S%G3756>unaware<s%> <S%G1097><s%> of the things which have <S%G1096>happened<s%> <S%G1722>here<s%> <S%G846><s%> in <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%>?"

And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G4169>"What<s%> <S%G4169>things<s%>?" And they <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, "The things <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> the <S%G3479>Nazarene,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> was a <S%G4396>prophet<s%> <S%G1415>mighty<s%> in <S%G2041>deed<s%> and <S%G3056>word<s%> in the <S%G1727>sight<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2992>people,<s%>

and <S%G3704>how<s%> the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> and our <S%G758>rulers<s%> <S%G3860>delivered<s%> Him up to the <S%G2917>sentence<s%> of <S%G2288>death,<s%> and <S%G4717>crucified<s%> Him.

"But we were <S%G1679>hoping<s%> that it was He who was <S%G3195>going<s%> to <S%G3084>redeem<s%> <S%G2474>Israel.<s%> <S%G235>Indeed,<s%> <S%G2532>besides<s%> <S%G4862><s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3778>this,<s%> it is the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G575>since<s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> <S%G1096>happened.<s%>
"But <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G1135>women<s%> <S%G1537>among<s%> us <S%G1839>amazed<s%> us. When they were at the <S%G3419>tomb<s%> <S%G3720>early<s%> in the <S%G3720>morning,<s%>

and did not <S%G2147>find<s%> His <S%G4983>body,<s%> they <S%G2064>came,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> that they had <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3708>seen<s%> a <S%G3701>vision<s%> of <S%G32>angels,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> that He was <S%G2198>alive.<s%>

"And <S%G5100>some<s%> of <S%G3588>those<s%> who were with us <S%G565>went<s%> to the <S%G3419>tomb<s%> and <S%G2147>found<s%> it <S%G2531>just<s%> <S%G3779>exactly<s%> as the <S%G1135>women<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> had <S%G3004>said;<s%> but Him they did not <S%G3708>see.<s%>"

And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G5599>"O<s%> <S%G453>foolish<s%> <S%G453>men<s%> and <S%G1021>slow<s%> of <S%G2588>heart<s%> to <S%G4100>believe<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> that the <S%G4396>prophets<s%> have <S%G2980>spoken!<s%>
"Was it not <S%G1163>necessary<s%> for the <S%G5547>Christ<s%> to <S%G3958>suffer<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> and to <S%G1525>enter<s%> into His <S%G1391>glory<s%>?"

And <S%G757>beginning<s%> with <S%G3475>Moses<s%> and with <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> He <S%G1329>explained<s%> to them the things <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G1438>Himself<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1124>Scriptures.<s%>

And they <S%G1448>approached<s%> the <S%G2968>village<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> they were <S%G4198>going,<s%> and He <S%G4364>acted<s%> as <S%G4364>though<s%> He would <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G4206>farther.<s%>

And they <S%G3849>urged<s%> Him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3306>"Stay<s%> with us, for it is [getting] <S%G4314>toward<s%> <S%G2073>evening,<s%> and the <S%G2250>day<s%> is <S%G2235>now<s%> <S%G2827>nearly<s%> <S%G2827>over.<s%>" And He <S%G1525>went<s%> in to <S%G3306>stay<s%> with them.

And it <S%G1096>came<s%> about that <S%G1722>when<s%> He had <S%G2625>reclined<s%> [at the table] with them, He <S%G2983>took<s%> the <S%G740>bread<s%> and <S%G2127>blessed<s%> [it,] and <S%G2806>breaking<s%> [it,] He [began] <S%G1929>giving<s%> [it] to them.
And their <S%G3788>eyes<s%> were <S%G1272>opened<s%> and they <S%G1921>recognized<s%> Him; and He <S%G855>vanished<s%> from their <S%G846>sight.<s%>

And they <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another,<s%> "Were not our <S%G2588>hearts<s%> <S%G2545>burning<s%> <S%G1722>within<s%> us <S%G5613>while<s%> He was <S%G2980>speaking<s%> to us on the <S%G3598>road,<s%> <S%G5613>while<s%> He was <S%G1272>explaining<s%> the <S%G1124>Scriptures<s%> to us?"

And they <S%G450>arose<s%> that <S%G846>very<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> and <S%G5290>returned<s%> to <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G7003>gathered<s%> <S%G7003>together<s%> the <S%G1733>eleven<s%> and <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> were with them,
<S%G3004>saying,<s%> "The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> has <S%G3689>really<s%> <S%G1453>risen,<s%> and has <S%G3708>appeared<s%> to <S%G4613>Simon.<s%>"

And they [began] to <S%G1834>relate<s%> their <S%G3588>experiences<s%> on the <S%G3598>road<s%> and <S%G5613>how<s%> He was <S%G1097>recognized<s%> by them in the <S%G2800>breaking<s%> of the <S%G740>bread.<s%>
And while they were <S%G2980>telling<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things,<s%> He <S%G846>Himself<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> in their <S%G3319>midst.<s%>
But they were <S%G4422>startled<s%> and <S%G1719>frightened<s%> and <S%G1380>thought<s%> that they were <S%G2334>seeing<s%> a <S%G4151>spirit.<s%>
And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G5101>"Why<s%> are you <S%G5015>troubled,<s%> and <S%G1223>why<s%> <S%G5101><s%> do <S%G1261>doubts<s%> <S%G305>arise<s%> in your <S%G2588>hearts<s%>?

<S%G3708>"See<s%> My <S%G5495>hands<s%> and My <S%G4228>feet,<s%> that it is I <S%G846>Myself;<s%> <S%G5584>touch<s%> Me and <S%G3708>see,<s%> for a <S%G4151>spirit<s%> does not <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> and <S%G3747>bones<s%> as you <S%G2334>see<s%> that I <S%G2192>have.<s%>"
[And when He had <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G3778>this,<s%> He <S%G1166>showed<s%> them His <S%G5495>hands<s%> and His <S%G4228>feet.<s%>]

And while they <S%G2089>still<s%> could not <S%G569>believe<s%> [it] for <S%G5479>joy<s%> and were <S%G2296>marveling,<s%> He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G2192>"Have<s%> you <S%G5100>anything<s%> <S%G1759>here<s%> to <S%G1034>eat<s%>?"
And they <S%G1929>gave<s%> Him a <S%G3313>piece<s%> of a <S%G3702>broiled<s%> <S%G2486>fish;<s%>
and He <S%G2983>took<s%> it and <S%G2068>ate<s%> [it] <S%G1799>before<s%> them.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G3778>"These<s%> are My <S%G3056>words<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G2980>spoke<s%> to you while I was <S%G2089>still<s%> with you, that <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> which are <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> Me in the <S%G3551>Law<s%> of <S%G3475>Moses<s%> and the <S%G4396>Prophets<s%> and the <S%G5568>Psalms<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> be <S%G4137>fulfilled.<s%>"
<S%G5119>Then<s%> He <S%G1272>opened<s%> their <S%G3563>minds<s%> to <S%G4920>understand<s%> the <S%G1124>Scriptures,<s%>

and He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G3779>"Thus<s%> it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> that the <S%G5547>Christ<s%> should <S%G3958>suffer<s%> and <S%G450>rise<s%> <S%G450>again<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead<s%> the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G2250>day;<s%>

and that <S%G3341>repentance<s%> for <S%G859>forgiveness<s%> of <S%G266>sins<s%> should be <S%G2784>proclaimed<s%> in His <S%G3686>name<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1484>nations,<s%> <S%G757>beginning<s%> from <S%G2419>Jerusalem.<s%>
"You are <S%G3144>witnesses<s%> of <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things.<s%>

"And <S%G2400>behold,<s%> I am <S%G1821>sending<s%> <S%G1821>forth<s%> the <S%G1860>promise<s%> of My <S%G3962>Father<s%> upon you; but you are to <S%G2523>stay<s%> in the <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> you are <S%G1746>clothed<s%> with <S%G1411>power<s%> from on <S%G5311>high.<s%>"
And He <S%G1806>led<s%> them out as <S%G2193>far<s%> as <S%G963>Bethany,<s%> and He <S%G1869>lifted<s%> up His <S%G5495>hands<s%> and <S%G2127>blessed<s%> them.
And it <S%G1096>came<s%> about that <S%G1722>while<s%> He was <S%G2127>blessing<s%> them, He <S%G1339>parted<s%> from them.
And they <S%G5290>returned<s%> to <S%G2419>Jerusalem<s%> with <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5479>joy,<s%>
and were <S%G1223>continually<s%> <S%G3956><s%> in the <S%G2413>temple,<s%> <S%G2127>praising<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>
